title: Scott Lee, music industry professional
itunes:title: Scott Lee, music industry professional
description:
Scott Lee, the man/myth and legend is on the show today. He's put on music festivals, managed bands, started companies and so much more...all within the music industry. He's my friend and a great human being. He shares his life experience in building communities, running festivals and being kind. This is a must listen to anyone interested in the music industry at large. Check out Great American Ghost and their new track, "Altar of Snakes" on Spotify. Their new LP is out on February 14. Visit Rockabilia and use the code PC100WORDS for 15% off of your order. The best place for all of your VIP experiences at shows is with Soundrink. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
